title: Ve'e yata ña iyoo ñuu ña nani mitla ña ndikaa chi Oaxaca
description:
An account of the Mixtec ruins in Mitla, Guerrero, Mexico.
Tone is unmarked. Contains a brief summary of ‘How to Read Mixtec’ in English and Spanish. Note that while the text is about Mitla, the language of the text is that of Metlatónoc.
